definition: to put on a hat/to be first/to dub
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: Previous research on the definite article has been conventionally confined to the sentential level of language.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的英語定冠詞研究是在句子的層面上進行的。

sentences.english: The woman with a large hat on her head is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 冠詞，顧名思義，就是戴在名詞頭上的一頂帽子。

sentences.english: Fill in the blanks with articles if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 在有必要的地方填冠詞。

sentences.english: History is a very interesting subject.
A Complete these sentences using a or an.
sentences.chinese: 完成以下句子，用冠詞a或an填空。

sentences.english: how far is it from here to there?
sentences.chinese: 這是對的，誰說there前面不能加定冠詞了？

sentences.english: Why is English article use so difficult?
sentences.chinese: 英文的冠詞爲什麼那麼難學？

sentences.english: They are really a difficult concept to grasp when you have no base knowledge of it.
sentences.chinese: 當你沒有基礎知識時，冠詞確實很難掌握。

sentences.english: Today we'll have listening practice. After that we'll sum up the usages of the definite article.
sentences.chinese: 今天我們先做聽力練習，然後總結定冠詞的用法。

sentences.english: Don't leave out the definite article.
Is the article in this sentence used correctly?
sentences.chinese: 這個句子中的冠詞用得對嗎？

sentences.english: Always add the appropriate articles in front of the noun.
sentences.chinese: 總是在名詞前加上適當的冠詞。

sentences.english: Notice this word, it is a proper noun, so no article is needed.
sentences.chinese: 注意這個單詞是一個專有名詞，不用冠詞。

sentences.english: The articles are preposed in most languages.
sentences.chinese: 大多數語言的冠詞都是前置的。

sentences.english: We can't use the indefinite article with this noun.
sentences.chinese: 我們不可以在這個名詞前用不定冠詞。

sentences.english: Fill in the blanks dawn articles where (it is) whispered.
sentences.chinese: 在必要的地方用冠詞填空。
